document.full_text: the embattled owner of the new york mets has taken a swipe at the struggling team's leading players, saying they are overpaid and underperforming and should not expect top money for their next contracts.
document.title: mets owner fred wilpon takes swipe at value of team's stars
lines_and_colors: the embattled owner of the new york mets has taken a swipe at the struggling team's leading players, saying they are overpaid and underperforming and should not expect top money for their next contracts.
